title: Introduction to Aromatherapy
description: Learn practical and safe ways in which you can start accessing the benefits of essential oils straight away for yourself and family.
cleaned_text: Introduction to Aromatherapy $49.50 In this course you will learn that Aromatherapy is not just about aroma! You will learn about its history and various applications and therapeutic uses, and how you can start using essential oils straight away for you and your family's health and wellbeing. Learn Affordability Course Duration Certificate of Completion What's included in this online course? A step-by-step guide Study at your own pace Study where you want Study when you want Unique learning experience Course Lessons Meet The Authors Carol Hannington, Naturopath & Aromatherapist Christine Sinclair, Naturopath Christine has a Masters of Health Science from the University of Sydney, Bachelor of Health Science (Naturopathy) from the University of New England, and Diplomas in Botanical Medicine, Nutritional Medicine, Homoeopathy. For the past 20 years she has worked in the natural health industry as a consultant, researcher, writer, educator and clinician, and is the content manager for Switch on Health. Martin Stone, Naturopath Martin has over 20 years experience as a practitioner and educator in the natural health industry. He is also the owner, founder and managing Director at Switch on Health.
